channel.title: The CodeMeta Project
channel.description: Recent content on The CodeMeta Project

item.title: Agenda
item.description: CodeMeta Workshop Venue and logistics Portlant Paramount Hotel, Friday & Saturday Coffee at 8am, Lewis Room Sunday Force16 Workshop OHSU Collaborative Life Science Building, Rooms TBD Background materials and links CodeMeta Web Site NIH Software Discovery report CodeMeta Github repo Software Metadata Crosswalk Guidelines for Persistently Identifying Software Using DataCite Goals Consensus cross walk table JSON-LD draft schema Consensus on software metadata Outline of journal article April 15 Portland Paramount Hotel, Lewis Room

item.title: Codemeta Terms
item.description: Terms from Schema.org Recognized properties for CodeMeta Code includes the following terms from https://schema.org. These terms are part of the CodeMeta specification and can be used without any prefix. Property Type Description codeRepository URL Link to the repository where the un-compiled, human readable code and related code is located (SVN, github, CodePlex). programmingLanguage ComputerLanguage or Text The computer programming language. runtimePlatform Text Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (Example - Java v1, Python2.

item.title: Codemeta Workshop
item.description: April 15 - 17 2016 Portland, Oregon The Future of Software Metadata Agenda The CodeMeta Project Workshop The CodeMeta project does not seek to create yet another standard. Rather, we’re aiming to create a crosswalk table between standards already in use – think of this as a Rosetta stone of software metadata. Beginning in an Open Science Code-fest discussion lead by Abby Mayes and now thanks to a generous NSF EAGER Grant to Carl Boettiger (UC Berkeley) & Matt Jones (NCEAS & UC Santa Barbara), we will bring together leaders of software and data repositories with academic researchers to develop this crosswalk table for software metadata.

item.title: Crosswalk for DataCite metadata
item.description: Property DataCite programmingLanguage Format dateCreated Date (dateType=Created) dateModified DaTe (dateType=Issued) datePublished PublicationYear fileFormat Format license Rights publisher Publisher version Version description Description identifier identifier licenseId Rights relationships RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isPartOf), RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isVariantFormOf), RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isPreviousVersionOf), RelatedIdentifier(relationType=isNextVersionOf) affiliation affiliation "@id"; nameIdentifier

item.title: Crosswalk for Debian packages
item.description: The Debian package system defines archive metadata that is used by the popular apt package managment system on Debian and Ubuntu Linux distributions. Property Debian Package codeRepository HomePage dateCreated Date version numeric_version description Description identifier Package

item.title: Crosswalk for Dublin Core metadata
item.description: Property Dublin Core creator creator dateCreated created datePublished date license license publisher publisher version dcterms:hasVersion description description identifier identifier name title licenseId license

item.title: Crosswalk for GitHub API
item.description: Property GitHub codeRepository html_url programmingLanguage languages_url downloadUrl archive_url author login dateCreated created_at dateModified updated_at license license description description identifier id name full_name licenseId license issueTracker issues_url

item.title: Crosswalk for Java's Maven metadata
item.description: Maven is a popular packaging/build system for Java-based projects. Property Java (Maven) codeRepository repositories license licesnse version version description description identifier groupId name name depends prerequisites contIntegration ciManagement licenseId licesnse issueTracker issuesManagement

item.title: Crosswalk for NodeJS package.json
item.description: The npm package manager for NodeJS defines software metadata using a package.json file. Property NodeJS codeRepository repository operatingSystem os processorRequirements cpu / engines author author contributor contributor creator author keywords keywords license license version version description description identifier name name name depends dependencies / bundledDependencies / peerDependencies suggests devDependencies / optionalDependencies licenseId license issueTracker bugs email author.

item.title: Crosswalk for Python disutils
item.description: Python distutils allows users to associate a range of metadata information when packaging and distributing python-based applications or source code. Property Python Distutils (PyPI) codeRepository url programmingLanguage classifiers[‘Programming Language’] applicationCategory classifiers[‘Topic’] operatingSystem classifiers[‘Operating System’] keywords keywords license license version Version description description, long_description name name depends install_requires licenseId license developmentStatus classifiers[‘Development Status’] email author_email

item.title: Crosswalk for R Packages
item.description: The following table displays the crosswalk mapping of terms from the R package DESCRIPTION file to codemeta properties. Property R Package Description codeRepository URL author [aut] in Author contributor [ctb] in Author creator [cre] in Author datePublished Date license License description Description identifier Package name Title url URL depends Depends, SystemRequirements suggests Suggests maintainer Maintainer licenseId License issueTracker BugReports givenName givenName familyName familyName email email

item.title: Crosswalk for Ruby gems
item.description: Ruby gems specify metadata in a .gemspec file. Property Ruby Gem codeRepository homepage runtimePlatform platform author author license license/licenses version version description summary, description name name depends requirements, add_runtime_dependency suggests add_development_dependency licenseId license/licenses email email

item.title: Crosswalk for Trove Software Map
item.description: Trove Software Map. Trove is the system used by SourgeForce.net to classify software projects. Property Trove Software Map programmingLanguage Programming Language applicationCategory Topic operatingSystem Operating System dateModified last-updated license license version version description description name Title depends Database Environment licenseId license developmentStatus Development Status

item.title: Crosswalk for Zenodo metadata
item.description: Zenodo.org is a data archive based at CERN which is popularly used to archive and provide DOIs to academic software from GitHub, as described in the official GitHub guide to Making your code citable. Property Zenodo codeRepository relatedLink applicationCategory communities datePublished date_published funder contributors.Funder keywords keywords license license description description/notes identifier id name title licenseId license affiliation affiliation "@id"; ORCID

item.title: Crosswalk for figshare metadata
item.description: figshare is a general purpose scientific data repository that provides DataCite DOIs. Property Figshare codeRepository relatedLink applicationCategory categories datePublished date_retrieved keywords tags license License description Description name Title licenseId License embargoDate embargo_date "@id"; ORCID name name

item.title: The Codemeta JSON-LD Representation
item.description: CodeMeta uses JSON-LD to represent and translate between software metadata formats. JSON-LD lead developer Mau Sporny explains how JSON-LD works in this short clip: The JSON-LD Context File The current codemeta context file can be found at CodeMeta properties are built on and extend software properties from https://schema.org. A list of all properties provided by the current CodeMeta context file can be found on the terms page. Here’s an example codemeta.
